name: two-toned nesting baskets
notes:
pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only - not a finished product - no returns on digital products all sales are final

decorate your home with bulky & quick nesting baskets. they make the perfect gift basket or decorative storage basket for your home. this quick and easy pattern is worked in simple stitches and includes a video tutorial on youtube. three sizes are included in the pattern.

difficulty: easy
written in standard american terms

yarn
mary maxim home 
bulky weight #5
68% cotton, 32% polyamide (108yds/150g) shown in (a) grey, (b) taupe and (c) sand
small: 94 yds - 54yds (a), 40yds (b)
medium: 148 yds - 83yds (a), 65yds (c) 
large: 198 yds  - 116yds (b), 82yds (c)
for the set, purchase 2 balls of each colour. scraps can make another medium basket! 

hook 
us k/10.5 (6.5mm) hook
or size needed to obtain gauge

materials 
bulky yarn needle
scissors
measuring tape
garment tags
leather rivets

gauge
6 sts and 4 rows equal to 2" in hdc
5 sts and 5.5 rows equal to 2" in sc blo/flo

video link: https://youtu.be/tgdh8ivfi78
